titleStmt.title: Here after ensueth a propre treatyse of good workes
Von den guten werckenn. English
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted be me Robert wyer, dwellynge in saynt martyns parysshe besyde charynge Crosse,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Luther, Martin. Von den guten werckenn.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: The boke of good workes.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: saynt martyns parysshe besyde charynge Crosse
